paragraph.heading: 1Advanced Projects
paragraph.paragraph: A number of advanced wizards have been provided which allow you to take an existing Eiffel for .NET Project created in EiffelStudio and convert them into ENViSioN! Projects. The following wizards are available for this purpose:

list.item: /10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/import_eiffelstudio_project.xml Import Eiffel Studio Project - Allows you to create a project from an existing EiffelStudio Project.
